locations.name: Mexico City
locations.description: The vibrant capital of Mexico, offering a blend of rich history, colonial architecture, world-class museums (like Frida Kahlo's home in Coyoacán), bustling markets, and sophisticated dining, serving as a base for exploring nearby sites like Teotihuacan.

locations.name: Tulum
locations.description: A stylish town on the Riviera Maya famed for its well-preserved Mayan ruins perched above turquoise waters, stunning white-sand beaches, nearby cenotes (natural swimming holes), and a chic, bohemian atmosphere.
